name: You Died!
description:
You died! Now, you're officially a ghost.  Rather than brains or grains, you desire only to get home. In order to do so, you need to clear the way for your zombified self and steer it from danger. Use the keyboard and mouse to move around and remove dangers from your bodies path.

The free demo includes the first level only, for the complete story and other levels, please download the full version!
